meanings.def: a chemical element. Carbon is found in all living things, existing in a pure state as diamond and graphite.
examples: iron with a high carbon content

meanings.def: used when referring to the gas carbon dioxide in terms of the effect it has on the earth’s climate in causing global warming
examples: (British English) How do we move to a low-carbon economy?

meanings.def: a copy of a document, letter, etc. made with carbon paper
a person or thing that is very similar to somebody/something else
